review: Everything is good on this unit however the remote really sucks as the left right up down often run into eachother so when you try to go right sometimes it goes down.  The Roku, by far, a better remote and quicker navigation.

review: This is a rock solid, ingenious device. Lots of viewing choices, and more added every week. Most apps are free from Amazon. Some require subscription (e.g. Netflix), but several news sources are available for free. Having Amazon Prime makes this a particularly good entertainment choice.
author: T. Cole

review: I ADORE this.  The best online content access device for the tv.
author: Amazon philo

review: Way too much buffering. Netflix hardly ever works on the Fire Stick, however my kids Wii-u, that also plays Netflix, doesn't buffer anywhere NEAR as much. Constantly says no network connection, but when I check the other devices in my home, they're all connected. HBOgo may as well not be compatible because it freezes 90% of the time. Takes 30 extra min to watch a movie. The only thing that seems to work ok IS Amazon Library and Prime movies of course. Over all the stick has ok days, but it bad days out weigh the good days. I've been told the Fire TV is much better. MAy try my luck with it instead.
author: theladyny
